name: balloond
description: Balloon'd - Modern Dating App with Balloon Pop Reveal

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.expo

author: Balloon'd Team
